title: Why won't Riot allow me to Change my Username?
body: So I wanted to change my nme to something akin to "Greatest Kassadin NA" or "CantCatchKass", but LOL will not let me use that name even though i checked to see if anyone else was using those names and noone was...Please fix this ASAP...

replies.body: The name has ass in it, so it's filtered by our naming system.  Kappa  Reach out to us in a ticket, and we'll see if we can help you out individually.  Make sure to have the currency ready just in case.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
Thank you for getting back to me so soon...But unfortunatly i already changed my name but ill definetly reach out to you guys when I need another name change!
